original_title: Five takeaways from a week of Trump’s Ukraine diplomacy — RT World News
article_summary: French President Emmanuel Macron advocates for a robust Ukrainian army with no size limits, rejecting Russia's demands for restrictions on Ukraine's military. Macron made these remarks following a meeting with Zelensky, other European leaders, and US President Donald Trump, emphasizing the need for European countries to provide security guarantees and military equipment for Ukraine.</s>
